title: Verizon's Samsung Pay update now out for compatible phones
text:
Verizon's Samsung Pay update now out for compatible phones 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Verizon has started rolling out the software update it promised earlier this October -- one that adds Samsung Pay to the Galaxy S6, S6 Edge,...
